firearms.name: Shotgun
firearms.description: Premium quality shotguns designed for hunting, sport shooting, and defense applications. Built for accuracy, power, and reliability, our shotguns meet the needs of both professionals and enthusiasts. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.
advantages: High stopping power with smooth operation
Suitable for hunting, tactical, and defense use
Available in pump-action, semi-auto, and sporting models

firearms.name: Gun & Sporting Gun
firearms.description: Sporting guns are designed for precision shooting sports and hunting. Engineered with balance, smooth trigger action, and refined craftsmanship, these firearms deliver excellent performance for competitive shooters. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.

firearms.name: Revolver
firearms.description: Classic and reliable revolvers built for self-defense, law enforcement, and collectors. Known for their robust design and easy operation, revolvers continue to be a trusted sidearm. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.
advantages: Preferred choice for collectors and defense

firearms.name: Air Gun
firearms.description: Air guns are versatile firearms used for training, sport shooting, and small game hunting. They provide affordable and safe practice while maintaining excellent accuracy. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.

firearms.name: Release Gun
firearms.description: Release guns are specialized firearms designed for clay shooting and competitive trap events. With finely tuned triggers and barrels, they are built to perform under precision-based sports. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.
advantages: Designed for clay and trap shooting
Adjustable stocks and smooth trigger pull

firearms.name: Nail Shotgun
firearms.description: Nail shotguns are specialized industrial firearms used for fastening nails into hard surfaces. They are widely used in construction and industrial applications for speed and reliability. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.
advantages: Safe and efficient when used with proper tools

firearms.name: Spare Barrel
firearms.description: Spare barrels provide firearm owners with the flexibility to change calibers or replace worn-out parts. Manufactured from high-grade steel, they ensure durability and reliable performance. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.

firearms.name: Paintball Marker
firearms.description: Paintball markers are designed for recreational shooting sports, offering fun and safe experiences. Built with precision, they provide accurate shooting in competitive paintball games. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.

firearms.name: Rifle
firearms.description: Rifles are precision-engineered firearms designed for accuracy, range, and versatility. They are available in bolt-action, semi-automatic, and tactical configurations, making them suitable for hunting, sport shooting, law enforcement, and military use. With high muzzle velocity and consistent performance, rifles remain the preferred choice for marksmen and professionals. We deal in all leading international brands of firearms as mentioned on our products page.
advantages: Available in multiple calibers and configurations
Reliable for hunting, defense, and tactical use
Ergonomic and durable design for field conditions

ammunition.name: 12 Bore
ammunition.description: The 12 bore shotgun cartridge is the most widely used ammunition type for hunting, sport shooting, and personal defense. Known for its versatility, it can fire birdshot, buckshot, or slugs with excellent stopping power. Its balance of performance and availability makes it the standard choice for professionals and enthusiasts alike.
advantages: High stopping power with buckshot and slugs
Trusted by hunters and security forces worldwide

ammunition.name: 16 Bore
ammunition.description: The 16 bore cartridge offers a balance between the heavy 12 bore and the lighter 20 bore. It is ideal for hunters who want manageable recoil with effective performance on birds and medium game. Though less common, it is favored by traditional shooters for its classic feel.
advantages: Suitable for both small and medium game

ammunition.name: 20 Bore
ammunition.description: The 20 bore shotgun cartridge is popular for sport shooting and small-game hunting. Its lighter recoil makes it easier to handle, especially for beginners or those who prefer faster follow-up shots. Despite its smaller size, it delivers consistent performance in the field.
advantages: Great for youth and beginner shooters
Effective for small game and birds
Faster target acquisition due to lower recoil

ammunition.name: 410 Bore
ammunition.description: The .410 bore cartridge is a lightweight shotgun round commonly used for training, pest control, and small-game hunting. Its minimal recoil makes it beginner-friendly, while still providing adequate performance at short ranges.
advantages: Lightweight and easy to carry in bulk
Good for pest control and small game

ammunition.name: Revolver Ammunition
ammunition.description: Revolver ammunition is designed for classic handguns such as the .38 Special and .357 Magnum. Known for reliability, these rounds are widely used for personal defense, law enforcement, and sport shooting. Available in both target loads and high-powered defense cartridges.
advantages: Effective for both defense and sport
Proven track record in law enforcement

ammunition.name: 9mm Ammunition
ammunition.description: The 9mm cartridge is the most widely used handgun ammunition in the world. Trusted by military, police, and civilian shooters alike, it offers excellent balance between recoil, accuracy, and stopping power. Ideal for both defense and target practice.

ammunition.name: Chalk Rounds
ammunition.description: Chalk rounds are non-lethal training ammunition used for practice, signaling, or riot control. They leave a visible mark on impact, making them excellent for drills and simulations without live fire risks.
advantages: Used in law enforcement and military training

ammunition.name: Nail Shotgun Cartridges
ammunition.description: Nail shotgun cartridges are specialized industrial loads used in construction for fixing nails into hard surfaces. They provide a quick and powerful solution for fastening, commonly used with nail guns and industrial tools.
advantages: Safe when used with proper equipment

ammunition.name: Air Gun Pellets
ammunition.description: Air gun pellets are designed for air rifles and pistols, offering a cost-effective and accurate solution for training, plinking, and pest control. Available in multiple shapes such as wadcutter, domed, and pointed for different purposes.
advantages: Ideal for practice and small pests

accessories.name: Fire Alarms
accessories.description: Fire alarms are essential safety devices designed to detect smoke, fire, or hazardous gases and provide early warnings to protect lives and property. They are widely used in residential, industrial, and commercial environments, with modern alarms featuring advanced sensors, loud sirens, and strobe lights.

accessories.name: Firearms Accessories
accessories.description: Firearm accessories improve performance, usability, and safety. This includes cleaning kits, grips, extra magazines, bipods, and slings. They allow shooters to customize and maintain their weapons for professional, tactical, or recreational use.
advantages: Essential for firearm care and maintenance

accessories.name: Training Equipment
accessories.description: Training gear includes dummy rounds, chalk rounds, shooting targets, and simulators for skill development. It ensures safe and effective practice for both beginners and professionals, offering a controlled environment for confidence building.
advantages: Used in police and military drills

accessories.name: Holsters & Belt
accessories.description: Holsters and belts provide secure carrying solutions for firearms and gear. Made of Kydex, nylon, or leather, they ensure weapon retention, quick access, and support for magazines and accessories during tactical or concealed carry.

accessories.name: Knives & Tools
accessories.description: Knives and tools are vital for tactical, survival, and everyday use. From combat knives to multipurpose tools, they provide reliable performance for field operations, self-defense, and outdoor adventures.

accessories.name: Optics
accessories.description: Optics include rifle scopes, red dots, and magnifiers that improve precision and target acquisition. Built with multi-coated lenses and durable housings, optics are trusted for tactical, hunting, and competitive shooting.

accessories.name: Protection – Eyewear
accessories.description: Protective eyewear shields eyes from ballistic impacts, UV rays, dust, and debris. Built with anti-fog, scratch-resistant, and UV-protected lenses, they ensure maximum safety and comfort during shooting and training.
